name: Pig Jig
description:
This is a platformer where you're a pig...on a journey?

If you get bored of a level or find a level to easy or hard then hit the refresh button for a new one!...of that type. You'll understand when you do it...1000+ possible levels ... Wood Woot.

Use space key or mouse to jump.

Jump again when you touch a blue boost.

When in a boss fight collect the things they shoot (fish...they're fish) to kick it back at them.

To change game modes (so that lives aren't infinite) go to settings and remove it from Baby Mode.

If you have frame rate problems try turning off/turning on frameskip in settings.

This was made in more or less 7 days for the love2d game jam (2022) completey on an Android device.

Music by me using korg koassiltor for android, graphics and art completely by me. Everything is meee (even the oink the pig makes)!!!! (Except some sound effects and some libraries)

Level 9 is a lie...*I proceed to sob*

Oink
